dict.acceptation: 推测；猜测，臆测；猜中；假定，认为；

sent.orig: This year GUESS Summer Read-to wear continues its wildness and flirtation.
sent.trans: 今年的GUESS夏季高级成衣延续了一贯的狂野和风情韵味。

sent.orig: What's in my bag? Guess, guess, guess! Apencil, a ruler, And a pencil-case.
sent.trans: 我书包里有什么？猜，猜，猜！有铅笔，有尺子，还有一个铅笔盒。

sent.orig: Change the initial guess calculation method. Refer Object Properties for a discussion of EP Initial Guess.
sent.trans: 初步估计计算方法的改变。物业反对将讨论美国初步猜测。

sent.orig: Guess who the lion fires first? Guess who the lion fires first?
sent.trans: 猜猜狮子首先解雇谁？猜猜狮子首先解雇谁？

sent.orig: If you guess the results, 4A0B, four figures which players guess right, winning the game.
sent.trans: 如果猜测的结果为，4A0B,即玩家四个数字都猜对，赢得游戏。
